name: Don´t Spill
description:
Do you have enough organization and ability to win?


Don't Spill makes the player worry about ingredients, potions, money and the clients satisfaction, during the whole game. As far as you go, the higher the request of organization and time management are needed to pass the levels.

A lonely sorcerer is in need and decides to change this difficult part of his life, and by using his skills, changes the fate and reborn in his wealth times!

Using the local market, he creates a new business model, where all kinds of potions are sold to ANY client, no matter the age, race, or even the state of decomposition.

FEATURES

  • Unpredictable clients that choose what they want in a last minute decision
  • Casual game to relax but still keeps the challenge
  • Typical medieval fiction environment
  • Challenges for a single player
  • Fun to the whole family
